section.name: Apache Commons Geometry
section.p: Commons Geometry provides types and utilities for geometric processing. Key features include

ul.li: Support for Euclidean space in 1, 2, and 3 dimensions
Support for spherical space in 1 and 2 dimensions
Support for geometric elements of infinite size
Support for boolean operations on regions (union, intersection, difference, xor)
